page.title: 20Language in the Area.
page.content: Most of the people in the area speak English but there are still many people who speak in the Welsh Language. There is a fear that the Welsh Language is in the process of dying out but it is to be hoped that this is not to be the case.It is true that many of the people locally who speak Welsh are old and that most of the major influences are English.But there are signs that the Welsh Language is fighting back.Welsh is taught in schools,there are many Adult Welsh Courses,there is a channel on the television for Welsh,people can send their children to Welsh schools to be taught through the medium of Welsh and there is a youth organization called the Urdd which sends children to a centre in West Wales to have a holiday in a Welsh environment.
